name: Dream-catcher
body: Don't you hate when you can't remember your dreams? Dream Catcher is an app where you can easily track, analyze and record you dreams, so you never forget a dream again! Dream catcher allows you to sort and customize your dream logs as well as set a mood for that dream. You also have the ability to set a lock for entry into your dream catcher, so you never have to worry about someone seeing your journal
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
